Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model.turnstates

Interface TurnState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdditionalMoveState, BuildState, EndTurnState, MoveState
    public interface TurnState
    Interface for the states of the Turn State Machine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean endPhase()
      This method is called when the player decides to skip an optional phase and goes to the next one
      boolean firstSelection​(int builderID, Coordinate coordinate, boolean specialPower)
      This method handles the first action of the turn.
      Turn.State getStateID()
      This method returns the name of the state
      boolean selectCoordinate​(Coordinate coordinate, boolean specialPower)
      This method handles every action that requires a coordinate to be executed.

    • Method Detail

      • firstSelection

        boolean firstSelection​(int builderID,
                       Coordinate coordinate,
                       boolean specialPower)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method handles the first action of the turn. The action could either be a regular move or a special action
        Parameters:
        builderID - The parameter representing which builder has been selected to execute the action
        coordinate - The coordinate the player has decided to be the target of the action
        specialPower - The parameter which represent if the action is a special one or not
        Returns:
        True if this method is called from the correct state. False otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the parameters are invalid or when they are not consistent with the state of the game

      • selectCoordinate

        boolean selectCoordinate​(Coordinate coordinate,
                         boolean specialPower)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method handles every action that requires a coordinate to be executed. It could mean different things, depending on the current state of the state machine
        Parameters:
        coordinate - The coordinate target
        specialPower - The parameter which represent if the action is a special one or not
        Returns:
        True if this method is called from a legit state. False otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the parameters are invalid or when they are not consistent with the state of the game

      • endPhase

        boolean endPhase()
          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        This method is called when the player decides to skip an optional phase and goes to the next one
        Returns:
        True if this method is called from a legit state. False otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when it is called from a non-optional state that could have an optional instance

      • getStateID

        Turn.State getStateID()
        This method returns the name of the state
        Returns:
        the enum representing the ID of the state
